name: Karma land
description:
You play as one of the animals from the Karma Land. Each of the six creatures has it's own abilities. After death, you'll be reborn as another animal based on your achievements in life.

You can harvest carrots, kill another animals, run and jump. Everything will be reflected in your next life. Сheck the achievements chart by pressing F1 during the game.

Controls are WASD - move, Hold shift - Sprint, Left mouse button - Attack (where applicable), Space - Jump.

Owl has additional controls: Q - toggle fly, C - Fly down, Space - Fly up, Right mouse button - Drop da bomb.

Rabbit and chicken can't attack, they only can harvest carrots and run. You will be reborn as chicken if you commit suicide. Try not to.

Have fun and explore the land! In this game you can do anything you want. Get ready for reincarnage.

In Karma land
death is not the end.
Check what you’ve gained
and start over again.
